description: This file defines a React component called NotesList, which displays a list of notes with functionalities such as sorting, selecting, and deleting notes. It includes UI elements like toolbar, sort options, note items, and a message for when no notes are present.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete, sortOption, onChangeSort })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a list of notes with sorting, selection, and delete capabilities.

ctags.name: NotesList
ctags.pattern: /^function NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete, sortOption, onChangeSort }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete, sortOption, onChangeSort })
